Basic D2 utilities

Source: R/d2-utils.R
d2-utils.Rd

Basic D2 utilities

  • d2_which(): List path for D2

  • d2_version(): List the installed version of D2

  • d2_themes(): List available D2 themes

  • d2_layout(): Lists available layout engine options with short help

Usage

d2_which()

d2_version()

d2_themes()

d2_layout(layout = NULL)

Arguments

layout

Layout name. If supplied, display long help for a particular layout engine, including its configuration options.

On this page
